feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
